data.title: Animated films set in Paris
data.text:
1.

The AristoCats

1970 American animated film

Overview: The Aristocats is a 1970 American animated romantic adventure musical comedy film directed by Wolfgang Reitherman. It was produced by Walt Disney Productions and released by Buena Vista Distribution. The ...

Release date: 11 December 1970

Genre: Animation, Adventure, Family, Music, Comedy

Director: Wolfgang Reitherman

With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous ...

2003 film directed by Joe Dante

Overview: Looney Tunes: Back in Action is a 2003 American live-action/animated comedy film directed by Joe Dante and written by Larry Doyle. The plot follows Daffy Duck and Bugs Bunny (both voiced by Joe Alaskey) ...

Release date: 9 November 2003

Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family

Writer: Larry Doyle

A Monster in Paris

2011 French film

Overview: A Monster in Paris (French: Un monstre Ã  Paris) is a 2011 French 3D computer-animated musical comedy science fantasy adventure film directed by Bibo Bergeron, and based on a story he wrote. It was produced ...
